title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5008.3 - Ticket sales
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5008.3 - Ticket sales

State Regulations
(a) No person
shall sell a Lotto ticket at a price greater than that fixed by this

Part. (b) The price for each Lotto
wager is $1, which entitles the player to two game panels. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5008.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
